news.title: Bitcoin Holds Strong Above $65K Amid Market Uncertainty
news.snippet: Bitcoin continues to demonstrate resilience as the leading monetary network, maintaining strong support above $65,000 despite macroeconomic headwinds.

news.title: Over 400,000 BTC Accumulated Between $60K and $70K
news.snippet: On-chain data shows massive accumulation as long-term holders buy the dip during Bitcoin's latest price consolidation.

news.title: Lightning Network Capacity Hits New All-Time High
news.snippet: The Lightning Network continues its growth trajectory with record channel capacity, enabling faster and cheaper Bitcoin transactions worldwide.
